sentinel.led
Class LEDThread

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--sentinel.led.LEDThread
class LEDThread
extends java.lang.Thread

The LEDThread class denotes the event detector thread that processes event notifications. It gets notify objects from the notify buffer and invokes the methods contained in the notify objects.

Method Detail

process

void process(NotifyObject notifyObj)

run

public void run()
The run method of the event detector thread processes event notifications. It gets notify objects from the notify buffer and invokes the methods contained in the notify objects. It calls the wakeup() method on the notify buffer if the event being notified is a SYNCHRONOUS event. This is because if the event is synchronous, the application thread would be waiting by calling the wait() method on the notify buffer object. The wakeup() method calls the notify() method on the notify buffer object.
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

setLEDInterface

void setLEDInterface(LEDInterface ledInterf)
The method set the led interface instance. When the event raises, and the forward flag is set, we can propagate parameterlist and context to server through LEDInterface

getLEDInterface

LEDInterface getLEDInterface()
The method returns the led interface instance.
